00012 GLuint eol_shader_load_program(char *filenameVertex, char *filenameFragment)
00013 {
00014   GLuint program = 0;
00015   char *buffer1;
00016   char *buffer2;
00017   const GLchar *pSource = 0;
00018   long length = 0;
00019   GLuint vertShader = 0;
00020   GLuint fragShader = 0;
00021   FILE* file;
00022 
00023   if (filenameVertex != NULL)
00024   {
00025     file = fopen(filenameVertex, "r");
00026     if(!file)
00027     {
00028       eol_logger_message(
00029         EOL_LOG_WARN,
00030         "eol_shader:failed to open vert shader file %s\n", filenameVertex);
00031       return 0;
00032     }
00033     fseek (file , 0 , SEEK_END);
00034     length = ftell (file);
00035     rewind (file);
00036     buffer1= (char*) malloc(sizeof(char)*length);
00037     fread(buffer1,1,length,file);
00038     
00039     fclose (file);
00040     pSource = (const GLchar *)(buffer1);
00041     
00042     vertShader = eol_shader_compile(GL_VERTEX_SHADER, pSource, length);
00043   }
00044   
00045   if (filenameFragment != NULL)
00046   {
00047     file = fopen(filenameFragment, "r");
00048     if(!file)
00049     {
00050       eol_logger_message(
00051         EOL_LOG_WARN,
00052         "eol_shader:failed to open frag shader file %s\n", filenameFragment);
00053         /*TODO make this fail clean*/
00054       return 0;
00055     }
00056     fseek (file , 0 , SEEK_END);
00057     length = ftell(file);
00058     rewind(file);
00059     buffer2= (char*) malloc(sizeof(char)*length);
00060     fread(buffer2,1,length,file);
00061     
00062     fclose (file);
00063     pSource = (const GLchar *)(buffer2);
00064     fragShader = eol_shader_compile(GL_FRAGMENT_SHADER, pSource, length);
00065   }
00066 
00067   program = eol_shader_link(vertShader, fragShader);
00068   
00069   return program;
00070 }

00072 GLuint eol_shader_link(GLuint vertShader, GLuint fragShader)
00073 {
00074   
00075   GLuint program;
00076   GLint linked = 0;
00077   if (glCreateProgram == NULL)
00078   {
00079     eol_logger_message(
00080       EOL_LOG_INFO,
00081       "eol_shader:create program not supported.\n");
00082     return 0;
00083   }
00084   program = glCreateProgram();
00085   
00086   if (program)
00087   {
00088     
00089     if (vertShader)
00090       glAttachShader(program, vertShader);
00091     
00092     if (fragShader)
00093       glAttachShader(program, fragShader);
00094     
00095     glLinkProgram(program);
00096     glGetProgramiv(program, GL_LINK_STATUS, &linked);
00097     if (!linked)
00098     {
00099       eol_logger_message(
00100         EOL_LOG_WARN, "eol_shader:failed to link shader\n");
00101       return 0;
00102     }
00103     if (vertShader)
00104       glDeleteShader(vertShader);
00105     
00106     if (fragShader)
00107       glDeleteShader(fragShader);
00108   }
00109   
00110   return program;
00111 }
00112 
00113 GLuint eol_shader_compile(GLenum type, const GLchar *pszSource, GLint length)
00114 {
00115   
00116   GLuint shader;
00117   GLint compiled = 0;
00118   if (glCreateShader == NULL)
00119   {
00120     eol_logger_message(
00121       EOL_LOG_INFO,
00122       "eol_shader:create program not supported.\n");
00123     return 0;
00124   }
00125   shader = glCreateShader(type);
00126   
00127   if (shader)
00128   {
00129     glShaderSource(shader, 1, &pszSource, &length);
00130     glCompileShader(shader);
00131     glGetShaderiv(shader, GL_COMPILE_STATUS, &compiled);
00132     if (!compiled)
00133     {
00134       eol_logger_message(
00135         EOL_LOG_WARN,
00136         "eol_shader:failed to compile shader\n");
00137       return 0;
00138     }
00139   }
00140   
00141   return shader;
00142 }
